I set the plugin import wizards directory to c:\temp (which contains lots of files)

got the followung NPE dialog:
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.PDEState.loadManifest(PDEState.java:102)

Fixed.
the code was not checking for a null return value from Path.getFileExtension()
